articles.author: Amelia Wynne
articles.title: Child actor who played minor role in Titanic STILL gets royalty cheques - Daily Mail
articles.description: A child actor who played a minor role in the classic film Titanic has revealed that he still gets royalty cheques for his part in the movie which was released 25 years ago.
articles.content:
A child actor who played a minor role in the classic film Titanic has revealed that he still gets royalty cheques for his part in the movie which was released 25 years ago.
